title: Did Trump refer to his mouth as a "hopeful " musical instrument linked to the mind?
subtitle: During a rally in Montana, President Trump went reluctantly about the size of the crowd, comparing his letters with Sir Elton John's performances.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: At the 2018 gathering, President Trump compared his mouth to Elton John's members, adding that the brain "will be connected to the mouth."
